messages.message: In that sandbox, it’s the “https” link
Also, ppy does not exist anymore in that template ;)

Yes. I’m not at my computer right now, but @ligao.zhang there is a doc showing how to use that new template.

Some things are different from the usual ibdev template.
may I ask the doc link? :eyes:  (BTW, what's the best practice to find a doc? can we search by keyword from any place?)

My sandbox is not officially ready yet, so the doc has not been officially posted. It’s in “beta.” 

I know there is high demand for a better crafting template though so I will do my best to get it cleaned up and fully published at some point over the next week. 

I will send you a link to the doc.

Ultimately, what I would like to do is eliminate the engineering onboarding guide steps and point everyone to the crafting template instead. However, this whole thing is somewhat of a side project for me so I just haven’t had time to do that yet. Sadly, we really don’t have anyone at the company who is full-time dedicated to dev tools.
Give this man some story points! :prayge:
Thank you Matt! I am happy to work with you on building a better dev env(as my side project) if I can help.
I appreciate it! By the way, everybody following this thread, please come to my talk on Monday!
I am trying this out :smile: I had budgeted 2 hrs today to get crafting running, but it sounds like I'll only need 10 min?!
hmm i get this in my Workspace: dev module
Ah seems like the template now vs. what Jordy spun up has slightly changed (/home/owner/instabase/.sandbox/setup file has different contents) - maybe still editing atm?

@lydia are you using mfichman-ibdev-docker (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/templates/mfichman-ibdev-docker)? I am creating one, step *CustomizeHome* passed: https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/ligaozhang-docker?cw=dev

I think you created yours before me. I think the template just changed? I was wondering if there's version history in Crafting for templates, but i think not. sounds like best practice is to check it into a code repo
I'm actively working on improving it, so sometimes things break. Can you resync your sandbox and see if that fixes it?
Once this is truly ready, I'll check the template into git.
